attributes.action: Revoke speeding fines for drivers affected on the A20, sidcup 2023/2024
attributes.additional_details: Support people affected, reverse NIPs, make change to road signage and markings.
attributes.background: Cancel speeding fines for people affected by TFLs decision to implement an emergency temporary speed limit on the A20 sidcup eastbound between sandy lane to cookham road. Poor signage, lack of information, confusion and a money grabbing speed trap.

rejection.details:
Not the Government/Parliament’s responsibility

We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about overturning speeding fines are a matter for the relevant police force and the courts, not the UK Government or Parliament.
